__e: Spend your life paranoid, always looking for threats... and it makes it easy for someone to find them for you.
Then you tell him you saw I had it on me, that if he wants it, he'll have to come and get it, which won't be easy because I'm paranoid and I beefed up my posse.
Husband says she's been acting a little paranoid and she has the kid with her, so let her see me first.

I just need to make sure things look good, and I don't know if there's room for, like, putting flowers or having tea candles, because she thinks it's an energy thing, so it could go hand in hand with... like, I'm always paranoid that my phone is on.
Just because you're paranoid, Huey, doesn't mean we're not out to get you.
That's what my family says, that's what the police say, that I'm paranoid, that I'm delusional.
He was paranoid, but nothing says he wanted to take the lives of his people or our men.
I'm probably being paranoid, but there's someone I'm scared of running into alone.
I don't know if you're power crazed or paranoid, but I know she's right.
